snippet: Shares in Regado Biopharmaceuticals, a drug maker and the only company to stage its market debut on Thursday, had risen more than 20 percent before Nasdaq halted trading in all its listed stocks.
abstract: Shares in Regado Biopharmaceuticals, a drug maker and the only company to stage its market debut on Thursday, had risen more than 20 percent before Nasdaq halted trading in all its listed stocks.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Nasdaq's Halt Briefly Pauses a Good Day for a Newly Public Company
